rows.label: tlk41700151_04_msg0001
rows.name:
I finally understand what Brionac
is all about.

rows.label: tlk41700151_04_msg0002
rows.name:
They're a group that wants to drag down
the current Emperor.

rows.label: tlk41700151_04_msg0003
rows.name:
His Majesty the Emperor is a moderate, you see.
They want to fight more and more to expand the
Superbian Empire's territory.

rows.label: tlk41700151_04_msg0004
rows.name:
It's said that Brionac is backed by
 a portion of the Senate.

rows.label: tlk41700151_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Brionac is composed of pure-blooded Superbians...
people overflowing with patriotism.

rows.label: tlk41700151_04_msg0006
rows.name:
On the other hand, there's also an organization
called Lindwurm.

rows.label: tlk41700151_04_msg0007
rows.name:
Lindwurm is made up of people
other than Superbians.

rows.label: tlk41700151_04_msg0008
rows.name:
Like Brionac, they're anti-Emperor, but they're more
anti-Superbian Empire in general.

rows.label: tlk41700151_04_msg0009
rows.name:
They're said to be backed by Invidian nobles
and Nopon merchants.

rows.label: tlk41700151_04_msg0010
rows.name:
Lindwurm's goal is to crush the Empire, so both
the Imperial Army and Brionac are
obstacles to them.

rows.label: tlk41700151_04_msg0011
rows.name:
Recently, Lindwurm's leader, DÃ³n, got fired up trying
to avenge his son, so he drew too much attention
and was swiftly taken down...

rows.label: tlk41700151_04_msg0012
rows.name:
Both organizations are now in ruins.
There are only a few remnants scattered about, so
Emperor Niall will be safe for a while longer.
